title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - resolve panning/drift issues
description:
Maybe you experienced the issue yourself: the cockpit view was continuously panning/drifting to the left or another direction. In this video we will look at a few solution to resolve this video. 

NOTE: these are only a few items which resolved my issues there maybe other solutions. If so feel free to post them in the comment section of this video.
